body_html:
Thanks for the report.
That documentation needs to be updated.

IIUC, in 1.0.0 this would be replaced by ds.bijector.Affine

@jvdillon @ebrevdo : Something still seems fishy at head and in 1.1.0-rc1 where tf.contrib.distributions.bijector doesn't seem to exist. Mind taking a look?

body:
Thanks for the report.
That documentation needs to be updated.

IIUC, in 1.0.0 this would be replaced by [`ds.bijector.Affine`](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.0/tensorflow/contrib/distributions/python/ops/bijector.py#L1463)

@jvdillon @ebrevdo : Something still seems fishy at head and in 1.1.0-rc1 where `tf.contrib.distributions.bijector` doesn't seem to exist. Mind taking a look?
